name: Craft City (itch)
description:
Craft city is a real-time multiplayer city building game where everyone in the world picks a spot on the world map and starts building. The main goal of the game is get everyone working together towards creating the biggest virtual city the world as ever known! 

If you're experiencing issues while playing the game from this page, try the native web version at https://play.craftcitygame.com/

REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER

Every players are on the same map, at the same time. Watch your neighbors grow while you manage your own neighborhood. No instances, everyone works towards the same goal in the same city.

CRAFTING

As a player, you can participate in making the town bigger. From dozens of items to craft, you can contribute to the city needs and help others around. Manage an industry through town planning and get things started

CITIZENS' REQUESTS

During the construction of your neighborhood, citizens often ask for help to solve their problem. They can be as small as helping them gather woods for the coming winter to set up a big competition with prizes for each participant. Those requests are the core of your progression towards growing your local community.

ROADS WITHOUT POTHOLES

It's almost magical!
